716327f-a.text:
New Stadium at the City College of New York.
On May 29 at the Greek Stadium, given to the college by Adolph Lewisohn,
was dedicated, and on July 4, it will be the scene of a great "American-
ization Day" celebration.
1915                  Bein News Service

730321f-a.title: General view - Amsterdam Avenue - Southwest and Northwest.
730321f-a.text:
Amsterdam Avenue, at W. 138th Street, (general view southwest
and northwest).

A set of two views from a roof-top in the "Heights" area of upper Manhattan. View. No. 1 is southwestward down the river to show at 122nd Street, the Riverside Church and Grants Tohb, No. 2 is northwestward to show the George Washington Bridge at 181st Street. In the background of both views is the dimly outlined
JJersey shore.

August 1935
Views: 1 -2

R. W. Hill
730321f-a.folder: Amsterdam Avenue and 138th Street, Manhattan, N.Y.

731418f-a.title: Colleges and Universities - College of the City of New York.
731418f-a.text:
College of the City of New York:
Amsterdam Ave., at the S.E. corner of West 138th Street. Shown is an entrance to the Lewisohn Stadium of the College of the City of New York.
This view taken before a Municipal Concert.

August 25, 1935.

R.W. Hill.
731418f-a.folder: Amsterdam Avenue and 138th Street, Manhattan, N.Y.
